meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the relationships between languages.
meanings.sent1: The glottochronological research helped linguists understand how languages are connected.
meanings.sent2: She presented a glottochronological analysis showing the similarities between different languages.
meanings.sent3: The glottochronological study revealed surprising links between ancient languages.
meanings.sent4: His glottochronological approach shed light on the hidden connections among various dialects.
meanings.sent5: The glottochronological investigation made the language connections vivid and clear.

meanings.definition: The method of determining the time of divergence of two languages from a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The glottochronological helped pinpoint when the languages split from each other.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used glottochronological techniques to estimate the age of the language separation.
meanings.sent3: The glottochronological calculation of language split time was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: The glottochronological method painted a clear picture of the language evolution.
meanings.sent5: Using glottochronological analysis, they traced the languages back to their origin.
